name: @brikcss/flipper
description: Flipper is a front end web module that flips things. In style. Flipper can flip an element in place or open it up to a modal dialog.

scripts.dev: npm run compile:less && npm run watch:less & npm run watch:sass & browser-sync start --config .browsersync.js
scripts.build: $(echo "@import 'src/sass/flipper'; @include flipper();" > temp.scss) && node-sass ./temp.scss --output-style=expanded --indent-type=tab --indent-width=1 src/css/flipper.css && rm temp.scss
scripts.watch:sass: node-sass examples/main.scss examples/flipper.css --output-style=expanded --indent-type=tab indent-width=1 && node-sass -w examples/main.scss examples/flipper.css
